technologies.summary: Solid experience with the newest ES standards.

technologies.summary: Solid experience.

technologies.name: HTML

technologies.name: CSS
technologies.summary: Good knowledge - normal flow, basic layouts. Lacking knowledge of browser support for the various vendors.

technologies.name: C#
technologies.summary: Solid knowledge - Reflection, Streams, etc.

technologies.summary: Solid knowledge - event loop, streams, etc.

technologies.summary: Good knowledge.

technologies.name: AngularJS
technologies.summary: Solid experience with the framework, good knowledge of its inner workings, like the digests/change detection.

technologies.name: Angular 2/4
technologies.summary: Good knowledge - basic building blocks, dependency injection, decorators and the metadata they are using.

technologies.name: Responsive design
technologies.summary: Very good knowledge of media queries, very good feeling for responsive UI.

technologies.name: AJAX
technologies.summary: Very good knowledge on asynchronous programming, higher order functions, Promises, async/await, etc.

technologies.name: ExpressJS
technologies.summary: Good knowledge - middlewares, routing, error handling.

technologies.name: RESTful API
technologies.summary: Good knowledge - RESTful APIs, simple authentication methods

technologies.summary: Good knowledge - middlewares, filters, attributes, MVC concept

technologies.name: MongoDB
technologies.summary: Good knowledge.

technologies.name: SQL
technologies.summary: Good knowledge.

technologies.name: Coding style
technologies.summary: Striving to follow good practices mostly, using ESLint/TSLint for style guidelines.

technologies.name: Git / GitHub
technologies.summary: Good knowledge of how to use them, both in GUI and CLI, good understanding of the concept of Git Flow and decent experience with it.

technologies.name: Task runners / bundlers
technologies.summary: Good understanding of task runners/bundlers - Gulp, Webpack.

technologies.name: Testing frameworks
technologies.summary: Solid knowledge of unit testing frameworks (Mocha, Chai, Sinon, Karma, Jasmine), solid knowledge of integration and browser tests (Protractor), some experience with Selenium Webdriver.

technologies.name: Algorithms and data structures
technologies.summary: Solid knowledge of algorith complexity, sorting and searching algorithms, tree structures.
